public_domain.title: Analysis and Assessment of the Gateway Process
public_domain.notes: 1983 US Army Intelligence report applying quantum mechanics and holographic theory to assess the Monroe Institute's mind-expanding Gateway technique as scientifically plausible for intelligence applications.

public_domain.title: Effects of binaural beats and isochronic tones on brain wave modulation: Literature review
public_domain.notes: Systematic scientific literature review on the effects of binaural beats and isochronic tones.
